body_html:
Okay..Thanks for replying ..Just confirm me is this correct...Sorry to bother

  1. I will retrain my custom model generat .pb file and txt file and give input_Name and out_putname as "Mul" and "final_result" during label_image build.
  2. Then as per your help will change ClassifierActivity.java to update Defaut values. Then build to generate infernce.so file by

bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so
--crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool
--host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain
--cpu=armeabi-v7a

  1. Create Java jar file by

bazel build //tensorflow/contrib/android:android_tensorflow_inference_java

  1. Open android studio create my sample app. Add jar file in libs and .so file in jniLibs and graphs in assets folder.

Now run the app..Correct right?
body_text:
Okay..Thanks for replying ..Just confirm me is this correct...Sorry to bother

I will retrain my custom model generat .pb file and txt file and give input_Name and out_putname as "Mul" and "final_result" during label_image build.
Then as per your help will change ClassifierActivity.java  to update Defaut values. Then build to generate infernce.so file by

bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so 
--crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool 
--host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain 
--cpu=armeabi-v7a

Create Java jar file by

bazel build //tensorflow/contrib/android:android_tensorflow_inference_java

Open android studio create my sample app. Add jar file in libs and .so file in jniLibs and graphs in assets folder.

Now run the app..Correct right?
body:
Okay..Thanks for replying ..Just confirm me is this correct...Sorry to bother
1. I will retrain my custom model generat .pb file and txt file and give input_Name and out_putname as "Mul" and "final_result" during label_image build.
2. Then as per your help will change ClassifierActivity.java  to update Defaut values. Then build to generate infernce.so file by 

bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so \
   --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool \
   --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain \
   --cpu=armeabi-v7a

3. Create Java jar file by 

bazel build //tensorflow/contrib/android:android_tensorflow_inference_java

4. Open android studio create my sample app. Add jar file in libs and .so file in jniLibs and graphs in assets folder.

Now run the app..Correct right?
